alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 10 at 2:23PM CDT until June 11 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River at Van Buren affecting Sebastian and Crawford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Van Buren. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, minor lowland flooding occurs along the shoreline from the I-540 bridge east towards Lavaca. Some rural roads near Lavaca may be impassable. Parts of Kelley Park northwest of downtown Fort Smith experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 22.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
